data.persona: I live in a glade near the village.  I am afraid of the fox.  I run fast when the fox chases me.
data.description:
You are in the Ruined house.
A dilapidated wooden structure with a caved in roof and debris everywhere.  Even the trees outside the house are falling apart.  There's waist high grass leading to the house along with a dirt path.
There's a broken vase, a tree, and a debris here.
The wealthy noble and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I give the vase to the spider as an offering
data.mid_motivation: I am expecting them to save me from the fox.
data.long_motivation: I expect to make friends with the noble and the spider.
